entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Binding Content Not Showing in SwipeView (Used Inside CollectionView) #16567
  • MAUI App template not sowing in the filter even though we installed MAUI as per tutorial #16565
  • Can't Find Apple SDK in .NET MAUI Build -- VS for Mac #16564
  • Can't Find Apple SDK in .NET MAUI Build -- VS for Mac #16563
  • Disabled VisualState not working in VisualStateManager of Button #16562

PullRequests

Updated

  • Implement Additional PointerGestureRecognizer Platform Arguments #16426
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8 branch #16527
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16536
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
